trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>必須建立在控制項中的每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised each time a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>引發資料列中每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，在控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至之前的資料來源中的記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件) 中的資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to access the properties of the row that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取引發事件的資料列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 建立使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object passed to the event-handling method to access the properties of the row being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以存取所繫結至資料的資料列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件，表示所建立或繫結到資料的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中所含物件`row`參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得所建立或繫結到資料的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件，表示所建立或繫結到資料的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property to access the properties of the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性來存取所建立的資料列或資料繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 建立使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property to access the properties of the row being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性來存取所繫結至資料的資料列的屬性。
